name: parallelio
description:
The Parallel IO libraries (PIO) are high-level parallel I/O C and
Fortran libraries for applications that need to do netCDF I/O from large
numbers of processors on a HPC system.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MPItrampoline: A forwarding MPI implementation that can use any other
MPI implementation via an MPI ABI.

dependencies.name: netcdf-c
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependencies.name: netcdf-fortran
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the Fortran
distribution.

dependencies.name: parallel-netcdf
dependencies.description:
PnetCDF (Parallel netCDF) is a high-performance parallel I/O library for
accessing files in format compatibility with Unidata's NetCDF,
specifically the formats of CDF-1, 2, and 5.

dependent_to.name: mpas-model
dependent_to.description:
The Model for Prediction Across Scales (MPAS) is a collaborative project
for developing atmosphere, ocean and other earth-system simulation
components for use in climate, regional climate and weather studies.
